title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form A-4 - Affidavit of service of mailing notice of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form A-4 - Affidavit of service of mailing notice of application

State Regulations
SURROGATE'S COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF ________
________X
ADMINISTRATION PROCEEDING AFFIDAVIT OF
MAILING
Estate of ________ NOTICE OF APPLICATION
FOR
LETTERS OF ADMINISTRATION
a/k/a (SCPA 1005)
________ Deceased. File No. ________
________X
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF ________)
________, residing at ________, New York, being duly sworn, deposes and says that deponent is over the age of eighteen
years; that on ________, 19 ________, deponent mailed a copy of the foregoing

Notice of Application for Letters of Administration, contained in a securely
closed postpaid wrapper, directed to each of the persons named in paragraph
4(b), respectively, as follows: whose post office address is
____________
whose post office address is
____________
whose post office address is
____________
whose post office address is
____________
whose post office address is
____________
whose post office address is
____________
whose post office address is
____________
whose post office address is
____________
by depositing the document in a letter box
or other official depository under the exclusive care and custody of the United

States Post Office, located at: ____________
______________
Signature

Sworn to before me this
________ day of ________, 19________. _________
Notary Public

Commission Expires: ________
(Affix Stamp or Seal)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
A-4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
